message.raw: fixed forked killing of child processes when running gazebo.  changes were: catch first wait() return value, and mark that process as dead so we don't try to kill it again.  also, switched to execvp on gzserver and gzclient.
message.html: fixed forked killing of child processes when running gazebo. changes were: catch first wait() return value, and mark that process as dead so we don't try to kill it again. also, switched to execvp on gzserver and gzclient.
